description: Make your hikes extraordinary with the Rush TRK LT GTX, featuring a breathable fabric upper for light weight support, paired with our Presa® outsole and DST chassis for outstanding stability and traction. With the feel of an athletic shoe and the support of a hiking boot, the Rush TRK LT strikes the perfect balance, providing you lightweight support for dayhikes or light overnights.
name: Scarpa Rush Trek LT GTX - Mens
